Uses of Class
simplenlg.framework.WordElement

Packages that use WordElement
simplenlg.framework The framework package contains the base components required for running the SimpleNLG package. 
simplenlg.lexicon   
simplenlg.morphology.english This package contains the necessary classes for running the morphology processor for the English language.

          get a WordElement with the specified ID

          General word lookup method, tries base form, variant, ID (in this order) Creates new word if can't find existing word
 WordElement Lexicon.lookupWord(java.lang.String baseForm, LexicalCategory category)
          General word lookup method, tries base form, variant, ID (in this order) Creates new word if can't find existing word
